author: controlcthenv
content: Where does geth support blockNumber as an optional parameter for `eth_getBalance`, was checking here https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/blob/d2e3cb894b6deab6ef599c6c241527124d8984bd/internal/ethapi/api.go#L639 and it doesn't seem to auto-populate `latest` but AFAIK the geth-json-rpc spec says its optional
